qas.question: What special item is included with certain versions of Twilight Princess HD?

context: Special bundles of the game contain a <a0_0><a5_0><b9_0>Wolf Link Amiibo<a5_0/> figurine<b9_0/><a0_0/>, which unlocks a Wii U-exclusive dungeon called the "<a4_0><a6_0><b13_0>Cave of Shadows<b13_0/><a6_0/><a4_0/>" and can carry data over to the upcoming 2016 Zelda game. Other Zelda-related Amiibo figurines have distinct functions: <a1_0><a7_0><b10_0>Link and Toon<a7_0/> Link<b10_0/><a1_0/> replenish arrows, <a2_0><a8_0><b11_0>Zelda and Sheik<b11_0/><a8_0/><a2_0/> restore Link's health, and <a3_0><b12_0>Ganondorf<b12_0/><a3_0/> causes Link to take twice as much damage.
